module.name: quality_pipeline
module.details: Modified quality_lf.sh to exclude venv/tests/build directories from recursive scans. Added explicit exclusions to lizard, ruff, skylos, ast-grep.

module.name: git_configuration
module.details: Implemented .gitattributes for line ending normalization (*=auto, *.sh=lf). Implemented .gitignore for venv/cache exclusion to prevent repository pollution. Removed invalid 'nul' file blocking git operations.

module.name: rendering_architecture
module.description: MapDrawer refactored to use Drawer pattern.
module.details: Split monolithic MapDrawer into FloorDrawer, ItemDrawer, CreatureDrawer, GridDrawer, LightDrawer. Composition pattern implemented for better maintainability and Redux parity.
